name: ATM Card Compromise Alert Scam
description: Scammer sends a fake security alert claiming the victim's ATM card has been cloned in Mumbai with multiple withdrawal attempts detected, pressuring them to call an emergency helpline.

turns.scammer_message: SECURITY ALERT: Your ATM card has been cloned at an ATM in Mumbai. Multiple withdrawal attempts detected. Call our emergency helpline NOW to secure your account.
turns.notes: Initial panic-inducing alert with no data yet.

turns.scammer_message: We have blocked 3 withdrawal attempts of Rs 10,000 each from your cloned ATM card. To prevent further attempts, call our emergency security team immediately at +91-8866442200. Available 24x7.
turns.notes: Phone number revealed with specific fake blocked transactions.

turns.scammer_message: To secure your funds, we need to transfer your balance to a safe holding account. Please initiate a transfer to protected account 2233445566778899 (RBI Insured Security Account). Your funds will be returned after investigation.
turns.notes: Bank account revealed as 'safe holding account'.

turns.scammer_message: ALERT: Another cloned card withdrawal of Rs 20,000 was just attempted. Transfer your remaining balance to secure account 2233445566778899 IMMEDIATELY or call +91-8866442200. Every minute of delay puts your money at risk.
turns.notes: Final escalation repeating both phone and bank account.
